titleStmt.title: The tyranny of Satan, discovered by the teares of a converted sinner, in a sermon preached in Paules Church, on the 28 of August, 1642. By Thomas Gage, formerly a Romish Priest, for the space of 38 yeares, and now truly reconciled to the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: Gage, Thomas, 1603?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Badger, for Humphrey Mosley, at the Prince's Armes in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
